data.title: Winter Special: How To Make Gajak At Home
data.meta_description: Winter Special: How To Make Gajak At Home
data.text:
Made with the goodness of jaggery, gajak is a popular winter snack cum dessert that is popular all across the country.

Made with the goodness of jaggery, gajak is a popular winter snack cum dessert that is popular all across the country.

1 cup sesame seeds, 3/4 cup jaggery, 1 tbsp ghee, 1 tsp oil, 1/4 tsp cardamom powder

1 cup sesame seeds, 3/4 cup jaggery, 1 tbsp ghee, 1 tsp oil, 1/4 tsp cardamom powder

Grease a pastry tray with oil, keep aside. Roast sesame seeds in a pan, till they turn pinkish. Remove, keep aside.

Grease a pastry tray with oil, keep aside. Roast sesame seeds in a pan, till they turn pinkish. Remove, keep aside.

Mark out indentations for squares as desired. Allow to cool completely and serve.

Mark out indentations for squares as desired. Allow to cool completely and serve.
